msg: First pass on updating the ecommerce style sheet, based on the patch found in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1119. Tested on FF2 and IE7.
This commit should not result in any layout changes. If you spot any problems, post a link on the dev mailing list and I will take care of it.
